title: having trouble with the 6.23 patch
body: says unspecified error occurred.please check the logs for more infrmation.

replies.body: There was a live incident that occurred yesterday around the time you posted this. This affected both login and patching services. If you're still experiencing this, please let me know, but the issue from our end has been resolved.
I am having this issue as well and it seems to be the result of riot's update servers being down.
im having the same problem. Update Failed. unspecified error occurred. Check the logs for more info. Ive tried repairing the files but then the repair fails.
